Title: Requires a sworn affidavit stating the seller was informed of the fair market value of the property
Summary: Requires a sworn affidavit stating the seller was informed of the fair market value of the property which includes an estimate of the fair market value of the property be included in the real property transfer form.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring a sworn affidavit stating the seller was informed of the fair market value of the property be included in the real property transfer form
